name: Flickering Four-Leaf Sigil
description: Attach Four-Leaf Sigil to target character: At the End Phase of Every Round, you will switch to this character.
descriptionraw: Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C303227]</color> to target character: At the End Phase of Every Round, you will switch to this character.
descriptionreplaced: Attach <color=#FFFFFFFF>Four-Leaf Sigil</color> to target character: At the End Phase of Every Round, you will switch to this character.
storytext: A wondrous symbol shaped like a four-leaf clover, it is of great assistance to one who manipulates the elements.
